author: quoctruong
body: PackageSourceListProvider functionalities are not fully implemented yet so we want to remove it from the build for now.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @quoctruong can you please specify what issue this PR resolves in the PS description?

comments.author: quoctruong
comments.body: @daxian-dbw I updated the first comment, is that what you mean the PS description?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
Yes, thanks Quoc. Please don't remove the PR template in future PRs. The template is a checklist to track the information we want for a PR.
Is there a issue number that you can reference in the PS description?

comments.author: quoctruong
comments.body: @daxian-dbw There is no issue number. Oneget team came up with this task during our scrum.

title: Remove PackageSourceListProvider from build
